casebody.data:
21ST MORTGAGE CORPORATION
v.
Christopher N. SCHUMACHER Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided May 3, 2017

Richard Lewis, in support of the petition.

S. Bruce Fair, in opposition.

The defendant's petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 171 Conn. App. 470, 157 A.3d 714 (2017), is denied.
